name: Sweet Revenge London
tag_list: cupcakes-london, cakes-london, cupcake-delivery, cake, cakes, cupcakes, cupcake, cupcake-shop, cake-shop, celebration-cakes, birthday-cakes, childrens-cakes, childrens-birthday-cakes, wedding-cakes, photo-cake, photo-on-a-cake
overview:
Sweet Revenge cakes and cupcakes are handmade to order. These cakes use only natural ingredients. Beautiful and bespoke cakes are made for different types of occasion, weddings and celebrations quite varied in nature.

Delicious cupcakes are available with us in different flavours. They are adept at suiting different types of occasions like weddings, birthdays, anniversary and christenings. Drop by to experience friendly, helpful and personalized service. You can also relax over tea or coffee and have a chat with friends while enjoying cupcakes of Sweet Revenge cupcake bakery.

At Sweet Revenge cupcake bakery, we take pride in making colourful as well as delicious cakes. Range of cupcakes designed is quite varied and though each commission provided is very different from the previous, there are designers and cake decorators as well, who can discuss your idea of making the cake.

We know the value of money and price our cakes at a competitive rate. Freshness and usage of natural ingredients remain guaranteed when cakes are manufactured at Sweet Revenge cupcake bakery. It is adept at making different types of cupcakes that can fit in different types of celebration and event.
